title: Telstra Corporate typeface
content:
Hi,

I searched 'Telstra' on Typophile with, surprisingly, no results. I want to ID the new Telstra corporate face. Netto and Miso are very close. Can someone verify which one? Thanks in advance…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-04-02 at 1.54.16 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043225/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-04-02%20at%201.54.16%20PM.png) | 26.39 KB |
author: RBM

comments.content: Not an exact match, and it may be customised as they did with Sassoon Primary in a previous ID, but it looks a bit like [Isonorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/isonorm/).
